subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में मूल भाषा क्या है?
explanation_en: Gujarati is the official language of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में गुजराती मूल भाषा है।

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary occupation of the people of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के लोगों का प्रधान अभिप्रदर्शन क्या है?
explanation_en: In Rajasthan, the primary occupation of the people is in the services sector, including industries like tourism, education, and healthcare.
